name: Liv Labs
headline: Solutions for continence self-care
description: Liv Labs is a consumer healthtech company making modern solutions for incontinence. 29 million American women worry about leaking pee in public: an $8B market. Liv Labs is developing convenient self-care versions of proven-effective clinical treatments, including adaptive health coaching software and a novel continence pessary. Device inventor, Carly Price, reimagined the humble pillow for Casper and now leads digital retail design at Walmart. Company CEO, Melody Roberts, incubated digital service experiences now scaling globally at McDonald’s and Panera. We’ve raised $2.6M, including NIH and NSF grants, based on stellar effectiveness data and user feedback like, “With this, surgery is off the table.” US, European and Hong Kong utility patents have issued; Australia will soon. Our FDA-reviewed clinical trial launched at Northwestern University and continues at the OSU and UAB.

founders.name: Melody Roberts, Founder
founders.description: Melody is a career innovator of consumer conveniences. She is an optimist with a lifelong passion for improving daily life through better, more affordable products and services. Formerly: Panera, McDonald's, IDEO, Smart Design, Cooper-Hewitt. Education: Illinois Tech (MDes) and Yale University (BA). Colorado native.

founders.name: Carly Price, Founder
founders.description: Highly accomplished innovation leader and champion of human-centered design, with a passion for creating delightful products, services, and brand experiences. Has a proven track record of using insight-driven processes to uncover opportunities, drive concept generation and prototyping, and bring award-winning, iconic, useful, and beautiful consumer products and experiences to market.

##### Liv Labs Fitness
PRACTICAL PRODUCTS FOR ACTIVE WOMEN
![Mother and Daughter Hugging](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/6a8637df6d5b49feaa0aa1fce31a462a.jpg/v1/fill/w_270,h_478,al_br,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/6a8637df6d5b49feaa0aa1fce31a462a.jpg)
## You, only drier.
Get relief from problematic symptoms of urinary urgency, frequency and leakage in just 3 weeks with our affordable health coaching program designed to put you in control. 
[JUST DO IT!](http://www.livlabsfitness.com/<https:/www.livlabsfitness.com/promotion>)
### You deserve to skip, hop, lift, run and laugh without a second thought! 
![Meditate at home](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/11062b_8d35680774bc473b8f3cbf3043cdc819~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_540,h_689,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/11062b_8d35680774bc473b8f3cbf3043cdc819~mv2.jpg)
##### K+ Training Intensive
### Your goals: supported.
###### Every coaching engagement lasts for 21 days and includes:
###### ​
  * three private, online consultations with a pelvic health expert
  * access to curated training materials and exercise videos
  * daily message-based tips, reminders and encouragement
  * anytime access to your dedicated coach!


[BOOK COACH](http://www.livlabsfitness.com/<https:/www.livlabsfitness.com/promotion>)
##### K+ Training Intensive
### Your lifestyle: enhanced.
###### You commit just 5-10 minutes a day to make noticeable progress. No need to make a clinic visit, get a vaginal exam, search Instagram for the right videos, or deal with insurance. We curate content for your daily action plan, and share it with a simple link!
[SIGN ME UP](http://www.livlabsfitness.com/<https:/www.livlabsfitness.com/promotion>)
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/6a3bf1_0f64608b1a314b0bbea2eef976bff666~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_123,h_82,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/6a3bf1_0f64608b1a314b0bbea2eef976bff666~mv2.jpg)
#### Samara
###### "I tell my friends it's an easy way to make progress with incontinence, without a lot of like rigamarole."
#### Zofia
###### "I am very independent person. But it is wonderful to have somebody who gives you advice and listens."
#### Alicia
###### "It’s been really amazing. It was very stressful to have all those [medical] tests that are quite invasive. It was so nice to be able to ask questions and have this support. I didn’t feel alone."
#### Haley
###### "I got more out of the first call than I thought I would get from the whole three weeks!"
#### Ariane
###### "The coaching worked for me, because I already have a regular workout routine, so I could incorporate and add specific exercises easily.."
## You deserve to skip, hop, run and laugh without a second thought!
##### K+ Training Intensive
### Your needs: addressed.
###### Whatever your age or fitness level, you can stay active and live life to the fullest by learning to drink, toilet, kegel, exercise and even breathe differently. We help you get smarter...about what works for you.
[REGISTER NOW](http://www.livlabsfitness.com/<https:/www.livlabsfitness.com/promotion>)
![Elderly Woman at Gym](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/89bbafa7ce904817b22223beefe7129d.jpg/v1/fill/w_123,h_82,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/89bbafa7ce904817b22223beefe7129d.jpg)
![Pregnant Woman with Mother](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/0265ec600abe44569e688eb131e00785.jpg/v1/fill/w_123,h_82,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/0265ec600abe44569e688eb131e00785.jpg)
##### K+ Training Intensive
### Your options: explained.
###### Hitting a plateau of improvement? Uncertain what the future holds? Ready for surgery, but not sure how to prepare? We help you understand and navigate the options.
[ SIGN ME UP](http://www.livlabsfitness.com/<https:/www.livlabsfitness.com/promotion>)
Set aside time
Share concerns openly
Try out new habits
Stay the course
### K+ Training Intensive is for people who are ready to . . . 
##### Still have questions? Liv Labs' CEO, Melody Roberts, recently hosted an online question-and-answer session. There's a good chance she answers one or more of your questions in her opening comments. (<10min)
### Your personal leak coach
### Anytime access to your coach via messaging
### Weekly 1:1 consultations
### Bite-sized learning activities
### Proven-effective exercises
### Tools to manage continence at any stage of life
## Head Coach
Melissa Stendahl, PT, DPT
###### Coach Melissa is a licensed doctor of physical therapy with a decade of clinical experience treating patients with pelvic floor disorders. She designed Liv Labs' wellness services to empower more people with self-care best practices shown to improve continence and confidence.
[More about Melissa](http://www.livlabsfitness.com/<https:/www.livlabsfitness.com/about-8>)
![Copy of Melissa+pelvic+health+physical+therapist_small.jpg](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/6a3bf1_1d229c4718c94b82bd8851bc0c41182b~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_70,h_88,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/6a3bf1_1d229c4718c94b82bd8851bc0c41182b~mv2.jpg)
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/6a3bf1_3bd847da9b744b698ecf3f6dfb4e1530~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_149,h_150,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/6a3bf1_3bd847da9b744b698ecf3f6dfb4e1530~mv2.jpg)

generated_description:
### Liv Labs: Redefining Continence Self-Care for Women

Founded in 2017, Liv Labs is a Chicago-based consumer health tech company dedicated to empowering women through innovative solutions for incontinence—a significant yet often overlooked issue that affects around 29 million American women. With the incontinence market valued at approximately $8 billion, Liv Labs is stepping in to alleviate the embarrassment and challenges women face daily.

**Mission**  
Liv Labs aims to make self-care for incontinence both simple and effective. Their approach revolves around developing modern solutions that are not just clinically proven but also convenient for everyday use. The company’s flagship offerings include adaptive health coaching software and a novel continence pessary, designed to help women regain control without the stigma traditionally associated with such medical conditions.

**Leadership**  
The team behind Liv Labs brings rich expertise to the table. Carly Price, the device inventor and a visionary behind Liv Labs, previously revolutionized the pillow industry with Casper. She now leads the digital retail design efforts at Walmart. Meanwhile, CEO Melody Roberts has a history of incubating successful digital service experiences on a global scale with brands like McDonald’s and Panera. Their combined expertise fuels Liv Labs' innovation.

**Progress and Validation**  
Liv Labs has garnered considerable attention, raising $2.6 million through prestigious grants from the NIH and NSF. Their robust clinical trial, reviewed by the FDA, is currently underway at Northwestern University with further trials at Ohio State University and the University of Alabama at Birmingham. They hold several utility patents in the US, Europe, and Hong Kong, with more pending in Australia.

**Services Offered**  
Liv Labs primarily revolves around their **K+ Training Intensive**, a comprehensive 21-day self-care program that combines:
- Three private online consultations with pelvic health experts
- Access to tailored exercise videos 
- Daily tips and motivation from assigned coaches

The ongoing support helps participants address the underlying issues of continence while easily fitting into their daily routines—no invasive tests or clinic visits necessary.

**Community and Resources**  
The company's community initiative, dubbed "The Nobody Talks Club," is designed to break the silence surrounding incontinence, allowing women to share experiences and foster a supportive environment. Liv Labs also provides an array of resources, including product offerings and self-care literature, all directed at helping women manage their health confidently.

In essence, Liv Labs is more than just a health tech startup; it's a movement aimed at transforming a traditionally sensitive topic into a matter of public discussion and personal empowerment. For women who wish to "skip, hop, lift, run, and laugh without a second thought," Liv Labs is a welcome ally.

For more on their solutions, visit [Liv Labs](http://www.livlabsfitness.com).
